plurals.name: risk_details_information_body_increased_risk
plurals.item: You have a higher risk of infection because you were last exposed %1$s days ago over a longer period of time and in close proximity to at least one person diagnosed with COVID-19.
You have a higher risk of infection because you were last exposed %1$s day ago over a longer period of time and in close proximity to at least one person diagnosed with COVID-19.

plurals.name: settings_tracing_status_body_active
plurals.item: "Exposure logging has been active for %1$s days. An exposure check can only be reliable if exposure logging is permanently activated."
"Exposure logging has been active for one day. An exposure check can only be reliable if exposure logging is permanently activated."
